channel.title: PKing
channel.description: when i set the timers for whip, it seems like its still really slow...even if its at 0 itll be slow can anyone explain why? are the weptimers for npcs or players? or both? and how can i get them accurate?(like about 1 second and you hit again)

item.title: PKing
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Codez Epic Codez
item.description:
@Epic_Codez wrote:

I think your using pimp or gangscape which automatically makes your setting for attacktimer X + 10; your input is the x try searching for the int what the timer is you might just find it.

Read full topic
